org.opensocial.services
Class AlbumsService

java.lang.Object
  org.opensocial.services.Service
      org.opensocial.services.AlbumsService

public class AlbumsService
extends Service

OpenSocial API class for album requests; contains static methods for fetching, creating, updating and deleting albums (collections of media items).

Author:
Jason Cooper

static Request createAlbum(Album album)
          Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, creates a new album in the current viewer's library.
static Request deleteAlbum(java.lang.String albumId)
          Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, deletes an existing album from the current viewer's library.
static Request getAlbum(java.lang.String albumId)
          Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the specified album and makes this data available as an Album object.

          Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the current viewer's albums and makes this data available as a List of Album objects.

public AlbumsService()
Method Detail

getAlbums

public static Request getAlbums()
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the current viewer's albums and makes this data available as a List of Album objects.

Returns:
new Request object to fetch the current viewer's albums
See Also:
Album

getAlbum

public static Request getAlbum(java.lang.String albumId)
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the specified album and makes this data available as an Album object.

Parameters:
albumId - ID of album to fetch
Returns:
new Request object to fetch the specified album
See Also:
Album

createAlbum

public static Request createAlbum(Album album)
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, creates a new album in the current viewer's library.

Parameters:
album - Album object specifying the album parameters to pass into the request; typically, caption and description are set
Returns:
new Request object to create a new album

updateAlbum

public static Request updateAlbum(Album album)
                           throws RequestException
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, updates an existing album in the current viewer's library.

Parameters:
album - Album object specifying the album parameters to pass into the request; id must be set in order to specify which album to update and values associated with any other property, e.g. caption and description, are updated
Returns:
new Request object to update an existing album
Throws:
RequestException - if the passed Album object does not have an id property set

deleteAlbum

public static Request deleteAlbum(java.lang.String albumId)
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, deletes an existing album from the current viewer's library.

Parameters:
albumId - ID of album to delete
Returns:
new Request object to delete an existing album
